justification: The data clump identified by key 0 includes multiple font and color resources that are used to define a theme. These fields share a common domain related to UI theming and are likely to be used together to represent the look and feel of the application. By extracting these fields into a separate class, such as 'ThemeResources', we can encapsulate the related theme data, making the code more modular, easier to understand, and reusable across different themes. This refactoring will also simplify the classes 'JasonsBigTheme' and 'JasonsHugeTheme' by reducing their responsibilities to theme logic instead of resource management.
